meanings.english_definition: surgical incision of the ileum and colon

examples.sentence: An ileocolotomy was performed to remove the blockage.
examples.translation: 閉塞を取り除くために回結腸切開術が行われた。

etymology.value: From ileo- (referring to the ileum) + colo- (referring to the colon) + -tomy (surgical incision).

readability_explanation.text: This is a highly specialized medical term used in surgical contexts. Understanding requires familiarity with medical terminology related to the ileum and colon.
